p.#text:
*)isokra/ths *)aqhnai=os e)gennh/qh me\n e)pi\ th=s o)gdohkosth=s
kai\ e(/kths *)olumpia/dos a)/rxontos *)aqh/nhsi
*lusima/xou pe/mptw| pro/teron e)/tei tou= *peloponnhsiakou=
pole/mou, dusi\ kai\ ei)/kosin e)/tesi new/teros *lusi/ou,
patro\s de\ h)=n *qeodw/rou, tino\s tw=n metri/wn politw=n,
qera/pontas au)lopoiou\s kekthme/nou kai\ to\n bi/on a)po\
tau/ths e)/xontos th=s e)rgasi/as. a)gwgh=s de\ tuxw\n eu)sxh/monos
kai\ paideuqei\s ou)deno\s *)aqhnai/wn xei=ron, e)peidh\
ta/xista a)nh\r e)ge/neto, filosofi/as e)pequ/mhse. geno/menos 
de\ a)kousth\s *prodi/kou te tou= *kei/ou kai\ *gorgi/ou
tou= *leonti/nou kai\ *tisi/ou tou= *surakousi/ou, tw=n to/te
me/giston o)/noma e)n toi=s *(/ellhsin e)xo/ntwn e)pi\ sofi/a|,
w(s de/ tines i(storou=si, kai\ *qhrame/nous tou= r(h/toros,
o(\n oi( tria/konta a)pe/kteinan dhmotiko\n ei)=nai dokou=nta,
spoudh\n me\n e)poiei=to pra/ttein te kai\ le/gein ta\ politika/,
w(s de\ h( fu/sis h)nantiou=to, ta\ prw=ta kai\ kuriw/tata
tou= r(h/toros a)felome/nh, to/lman te kai\ fwnh=s
me/geqos, w(=n xwri\s ou)x oi(=o/n te h)=n e)n o)/xlw| le/gein,

tau/ths me\n a)pe/sth th=s proaire/sews: e)piqumw=n de\ do/chs
kai\ tou= prwteu=sai para\ toi=s *(/ellhsin e)pi\ sofi/a|,
kaqa/per au)to\s ei)/rhken, e)pi\ to\ gra/fein a(\ dianohqei/h
kate/fugen, ou) peri\ mikrw=n th\n proai/resin poiou/menos
ou)de\ peri\ tw=n i)di/wn sumbolai/wn ou)de\ u(pe\r w(=n a)/lloi 
tine\s tw=n to/te sofistw=n, peri\ de\ tw=n *(ellhnikw=n kai\
basilikw=n  pragma/twn, e)c w(=n u(pela/mbane
ta/s te po/leis a)/meinon oi)kh/sesqai kai\ tou\s
i)diw/tas e)pi/dosin e(/cein pro\s a)reth\n. tau=ta ga\r  e)n
tw=| *panaqhnai+kw=| lo/gw| peri\ au(tou= gra/fei. pefurme/nhn 
te paralabw\n th\n a)/skhsin tw=n lo/gwn u(po\ tw=n peri\
*gorgi/an kai\ *prwtago/ran sofistw=n prw=tos e)xw/rhsen
a)po\ tw=n e)ristikw=n te kai\ fusikw=n e)pi\ tou\s politikou\s
kai\ peri\ au)th\n spouda/zwn th\n e)pisth/mhn diete/lesen,
e)c h(=s, w(/s fhsin au)to/s, to\ bouleu/esqai kai\ le/gein kai\ 
pra/ttein ta\ sumfe/ronta paragi/netai toi=s maqou=sin.
e)pifane/statos de\ geno/menos tw=n kata\ to\n au)to\n
a)kmasa/ntwn xro/non kai\ tou\s krati/stous tw=n *)aqh/nhsi/
te kai\ e)n th=| a)/llh| *(ella/di ne/wn paideu/sas, w(=n oi(\ me\n
e)n toi=s dikanikoi=s e)ge/nonto a)/ristoi lo/gois, oi(\ d' e)n 
tw=| politeu/esqai kai\ ta\ koina\ pra/ttein dih/negkan,

 a)/lloi de\ ta\s koina\s tw=n *(ellh/nwn te kai\ barba/rwn
pra/ceis a)ne/grayan, kai\ th=s *)aqhnai/wn po/lews
ei)ko/na poih/sas th\n e(autou= sxolh\n  kata\ ta\s a)poiki/as 
tw=n lo/gwn, plou=ton o(/son ou)dei\s tw=n a)po\ filosofi/as
xrhmatisame/nwn peripoihsa/menos, e)teleu/ta to\n bi/on
e)pi\ *xairwni/dou a)/rxontos o)li/gais h(me/rais u(/steron th=s
e)n *xairwnei/a| ma/xhs duei=n de/onta bebiwkw\s e(kato\n
e)/th, gnw/mh| xrhsa/menos a(/ma toi=s a)gaqoi=s th=s po/lews
sugkatalu=sai to\n e(autou= bi/on, a)dh/lou e)/ti o)/ntos, pw=s
xrh/setai th=| tu/xh| *fi/lippos paralabw\n th\n a)rxh\n
tw=n *(ellh/nwn. ta\ me\n ou)=n i(storou/mena peri\ au)tou=
kefalaiwdw=s tau=t' e)sti/n.

h( de\ le/cis, h(=| ke/xrhtai, toiou=to/n tina xarakth=ra
e)/xei. kaqara\ me/n e)stin ou)x h(=tton th=s *lusi/ou kai\
ou)de\n ei)kh=| tiqei=sa o)/noma th/n te dia/lekton a)kribou=sa
e)n toi=s pa/nu th\n koinh\n kai\ sunhqesta/thn.
kai\ ga\r au(/th pe/feugen a)phrxaiwme/nwn kai\ shmeiwdw=n
o)noma/twn th\n  a)peirokali/an, kata\ de\ th\n tropikh\n 
fra/sin o)li/gon ti dialla/ttei th=s *lusi/ou kai\
ke/kratai summe/trws, to/ te safe\s e)kei/nh| paraplh/sion
e)/xei kai\ to\ e)narge/s, h)qikh/ te/ e)sti kai\ piqanh\ kai\
. stroggu/lh de\ ou)k e)/stin, w(/sper e)kei/nh,
kai\ sugkekrothme/nh kai\ pro\s a)gw=nas dikanikou\s eu)/qetos,
u(pti/a de/ e)sti ma=llon kai\ kexume/nh plousi/ws,

ou)de\ dh\ su/ntomos ou(/tws, a)lla\ kai\ kataskelh\s kai\ bradute/ra
tou= metri/ou. di' h(\n de\ ai)ti/an tou=to pa/sxei,
meta\ mikro\n e)rw=. ou)de\ th\n su/nqesin e)pidei/knutai
th\n fusikh\n kai\ a)felh= kai\ e)nagw/nion, w(/sper h( *lusi/ou,
a)lla\ pepoihme/nhn ma=llon ei)s semno/thta pompikh\n kai\ 
poiki/lhn kai\ ph=| me\n eu)prepeste/ran e)kei/nhs ph=| de\
periergote/ran. o( ga\r a)nh\r ou(=tos th\n eu)e/peian e)k
panto\s diw/kei kai\ tou= glafurw=s le/gein stoxa/zetai
ma=llon h)\ tou= a)felw=s, tw=n te ga\r fwnhe/ntwn ta\s
parallh/lous qe/seis w(s e)kluou/sas ta\s a(rmoni/as tw=n 
h)/xwn kai\ th\n leio/thta tw=n fqo/ggwn lumainome/nas
perii/statai, perio/dw| te kai\ ku/klw| perilamba/nein ta\
noh/mata peira=tai r(uqmoeidei= pa/nu kai\ ou) polu\ a)pe/xonti
tou= poihtikou= me/trou, a)nagnw/sew/s te ma=llon
oi)keio/tero/s e)stin h)\ xrh/sews. toiga/rtoi ta\s me\n e)pidei/ceis 
ta\s e)n tai=s panhgu/resi kai\ th\n e)k xeiro\s
qewri/an fe/rousin au)tou= oi( lo/goi, tou\s de\ e)n e)kklhsi/ais
kai\ dikasthri/ois a)gw=nas ou)x u(pome/nousi. tou/tou de\
ai)/tion, o(/ti polu\ to\ paqhtiko\n e)n e)kei/nois ei)=nai dei=:
tou=to de\ h(/kista de/xetai peri/odos. ai(/ te paromoiw/seis 
kai\ parisw/seis kai\ ta\ a)nti/qeta kai\ pa=s o( tw=n toiou/twn

sxhma/twn ko/smos polu/s e)sti par' au)tw=| kai\
lupei= polla/kis th\n a)/llhn kataskeuh\n prosista/menos
tai=s a)koai=s.

kaqo/lou de\ triw=n o)/ntwn, w(/s fhsi *qeo/frastos,
e)c w(=n gi/netai to\ me/ga kai\ semno\n kai\ peritto\n e)n
le/cei, th=s te e)klogh=s tw=n o)noma/twn kai\ th=s e)k tou/twn
a(rmoni/as kai\ tw=n perilambano/ntwn au)ta\ sxhma/twn,
e)kle/gei me\n  eu)= pa/nu kai\ ta\ kra/tista tw=n o)noma/twn 
ti/qhsin, a(rmo/ttei de\ au)ta\ perie/rgws, th\n eu)fwni/an
e)ntei/nwn mousikh/n, sxhmati/zei te fortikw=s kai\ ta\
polla\ gi/netai yuxro\s h)\ tw=| po/rrwqen lamba/nein h)\
tw=| mh\ pre/ponta ei)=nai ta\ sxh/mata toi=s pra/gmasi dia\
to\ mh\ kratei=n tou= metri/ou. tau=ta me/ntoi kai\ makrote/ran
au)tw=| poiei= th\n le/cin polla/kis, le/gw de\ to/ te
ei)s perio/dous e)narmo/ttein a(/panta ta\ noh/mata kai\ to\
toi=s au)toi=s tu/pois tw=n sxhma/twn ta\s perio/dous perilamba/nein
kai\ to\ diw/kein e)k panto\s th\n eu)ruqmi/an.
ou) ga\r a(/panta de/xetai ou)/te mh=kos to\ au)to\ ou)/te sxh=ma
to\ paraplh/sion ou)/te r(uqmo\n to\n i)/son. w(/ste a)na/gkh
paraplhrw/masi le/cewn ou)de\n w)felousw=n xrh=sqai kai\
a)pomhku/nein pe/ra tou= xrhsi/mou to\n lo/gon. le/gw de\
ou)x w(s diapanto\s au)tou= tau=ta poiou=ntos ou)x ou(/tws
mai/nomai: kai\ ga\r sunti/qhsi/ pote a)felw=s ta\ o)no/mata
kai\ lu/ei th\n peri/odon eu)genw=s kai\ ta\ peri/erga sxh/mata
kai\ fortika\ feu/gei kai\ ma/lista e)n toi=s sumbouleutikoi=s

te kai\ dikanikoi=s lo/gois,  a)ll' w(s e)pi\
to\ polu\ tw=| r(uqmw=| douleu/ontos kai\ tw=| ku/klw| th=s
perio/dou kai\ to\ ka/llos th=s a)paggeli/as e)n tw=| perittw=|
tiqeme/nou koino/teron ei)/rhka peri\ au)tou=. kata\ dh\
tau=ta/ fhmi th\n *)isokra/tous le/cin lei/pesqai th=s *lusi/ou 
kai\ e)/ti kata\ th\n xa/rin. kai/toi ge a)nqhro/s e)stin, ei)
kai/ tis a)/llos, kai\ e)pagwgo\s h(donh=| tw=n a)krowme/nwn
*)isokra/ths, a)ll' ou)k e)/xei th\n au)th\n xa/rin e)kei/nw|.
tosou=ton de\ au)tou= lei/petai kata\ tau/thn th\n a)reth/n,
o(/son tw=n fu/sei kalw=n swma/twn ta\ suneranizo/mena 
ko/smois e)piqe/tois. pe/fuke ga\r h( *lusi/ou le/cis e)/xein
to\ xari/en, h( de\ *)isokra/tous bou/letai. tau/tais me\n dh\
tai=s a)retai=s u(sterei= *lusi/ou kata\ gou=n th\n e)mh\n
gnw/mhn. proterei= de/ ge e)n tai=s mellou/sais le/gesqai:
u(yhlo/tero/s e)stin e)kei/nou kata\ th\n e(rmhnei/an kai\ 
megaloprepe/steros makrw=| kai\ a)ciwmatikw/teros. qaumasto\n
ga\r dh\ kai\ me/ga to\ th=s *)isokra/tous kataskeuh=s
u(/yos, h(rwi+kh=s ma=llon h)\ a)nqrwpi/nhs fu/sews oi)kei=on.
dokei= dh/ moi mh\ a)/po skopou= tis a)\n ei)ka/sai th\n me\n
*)isokra/tous r(htorikh\n th=| *poluklei/tou  te kai\ *feidi/ou 
te/xnh| kata\ to\ semno\n kai\ megalo/texnon kai\ a)ciwmatiko/n,
th\n de\ *lusi/ou th=| *kala/midos kai\ *kallima/xou
th=s lepto/thtos e(/neka kai\ th=s xa/ritos. w(/sper ga\r

e)kei/nwn oi(\ me\n e)n toi=s e)la/ttosi kai\ a)nqrwpikoi=s
e)/rgois ei)si\n e)pituxe/steroi tw=n e(te/rwn, oi(\ d' e)n toi=s
mei/zosi kai\ qeiote/rois deciw/teroi, ou(/tws kai\ tw=n
r(hto/rwn o(\ me\n e)n toi=s mikroi=s e)sti sofw/teros, o(\ d'
e)n toi=s mega/lois peritto/teros, ta/xa me\n ga\r kai\ th=|
fu/sei megalo/frwn tis w)/n, ei) de\ mh/, th=| ge proaire/sei
pa/ntws to\ semno\n kai\ qaumasto\n diw/kwn. tau=ta me\n
ou)=n peri\ th=s le/cews tou= r(h/toros.

ta\ de\ e)n tw=| pragmatikw=| to/pw| qewrh/mata ta\ me\n
o(/moia toi=s *lusi/ou, ta\ de\ krei/ttona. h( me\n eu(/resis h(
tw=n e)nqumhma/twn h( pro\s e(/kaston a(rmo/ttousa pra=gma
pollh\ kai\ puknh\ kai\ ou)de\n e)kei/nhs leipome/nh. kai\
xri/sis w(sau/tws a)po\ mega/lhs fronh/sews ginome/nh.
ta/cis de\ kai\ merismoi\ tw=n pragma/twn kai\ h( kat'
e)pixei/rhma  e)cergasi/a kai\ to\ dialamba/nesqai th\n 
o(moei/deian i)di/ais metabolai=s kai\ ce/nois e)peisodi/ois ta/
te a)/lla o(/sa peri\ th\n pragmatikh\n oi)konomi/an e)/stin
a)gaqa\ pollw=| mei/zona/ e)sti par' *)isokra/tei kai\ krei/ttona,
ma/lista d' h( proai/resis h( tw=n lo/gwn, peri\ ou(\s
e)spou/daze, kai\ tw=n u(poqe/sewn to\ ka/llos, e)n ai(=s
e)poiei=to ta\s diatriba/s. e)c w(=n ou) le/gein deinou\s mo/non
a)perga/sait' a)\n tou\s prose/xontas au)tw=| to\n nou=n, a)lla\
kai\ ta\ h)/qh spoudai/ous, oi)/kw| te kai\ po/lei kai\ o(/lh|
th=| *(ella/di xrhsi/mous. kra/tista ga\r dh\ paideu/mata

pro\s a)reth\n e)n toi=s *)isokra/tous e)/stin eu(rei=n lo/gois.
kai\ e)/gwge/ fhmi xrh=nai tou\s me/llontas ou)xi\ me/ros ti
th=s politikh=s duna/mews a)ll' o(/lhn au)th\n kth/sasqai
tou=ton e)/xein to\n r(h/tora dia\ xeiro/s. kai\ ei)/ tis e)pithdeu/ei
th\n a)lhqinh\n filosofi/an, mh\ to\ qewrhtiko\n 
au)th=s mo/non a)gapw=n a)lla\ kai\ to\ praktiko/n, mhd'
a)f' w(=n au)to\s a)/lupon e(/cei bi/on, tau=ta proairou/menos,
a)ll' e)c w(=n pollou\s w)felh/sei, parakeleusai/mhn a)\n
au)tw=| th\n e)kei/nou tou= r(h/toros mimei=sqai proai/resin.

ti/s ou)k a)\n ge/noito filo/poli/s te kai\ filo/dhmos
h)\ ti/s ou)k a)\n e)pithdeu/seie th\n politikh\n kaloka)gaqi/an
a)nagnou\s au)tou= to\n *panhguriko/n; e)n w(=| dieciw\n ta\s
tw=n a)rxai/wn a)reta\s fhsi/n, w(s oi( th\n *(ella/da e)leuqerw/santes
a)po\ tw=n barba/rwn ou) ta\ pole/mia deinoi\
mo/non h)=san, a)lla\ kai\ ta\ h)/qh gennai=oi kai\ filo/timoi 
kai\ sw/frones, oi(/ ge tw=n me\n koinw=n ma=llon e)fro/ntizon
h)\ tw=n i)di/wn, tw=n de\ a)llotri/wn h(=tton e)pequ/moun h)\
tw=n a)duna/twn kai\ th\n eu)daimoni/an ou) pro\s a)rgu/rion
e)/krinon a)lla\ pro\s eu)doci/an, me/gan oi)o/menoi toi=s paisi\
katalei/yein plou=ton kai\ a)nepi/fqonon th\n para\ toi=s 
plh/qesi timh/n: krei/ttona de\ h(gou=nto to\n eu)sxh/mona
qa/naton h)\  to\n a)kleh= bi/on, e)sko/poun de\ ou)x o(/pws
oi( no/moi kalw=s kai\ a)kribw=s au)toi=s e(/cousin, a)ll' w(s

h( tw=n kaq' h(me/ran e)pithdeuma/twn metrio/ths mhqe\n
e)kbh/setai tw=n patri/wn: ou(/tws de\ ei)=xen au)toi=s ta\
pro\s a)llh/lous filoti/mws kai\ politikw=s, w(/ste kai\ ta\s
sta/seis e)poiou=nto pro\s a)llh/lous, po/teroi plei/w th\n
po/lin a)gaqa\ poih/sousin, ou)x oi(/tines tou\s e(te/rous
a)pole/santes tw=n loipw=n au)toi\ a)/rcousi. th=| de\ au)th=|
proqumi/a| xrw/menoi kai\ pro\s th\n *(ella/da tw=| qerapeu/ein
prosh/gonto ta\s po/leis kai\ tw=| pei/qein tai=s
eu)ergesi/ais ma=llon h)\ tw=| bia/zesqai toi=s o(/plois katei=xon,
pistote/rois xrw/menoi toi=s lo/gois h)\ nu=n toi=s o(/rkois,
kai\ tai=s sunqh/kais a)ciou=ntes ma=llon e)mme/nein h)\ tai=s
a)na/gkais, toiau=ta de\ peri\ tw=n h(tto/nwn a)ciou=ntes
ginw/skein, oi(=a peri\ sfw=n au)tw=n tou\s krei/ttous a)\n
h)ci/wsan fronei=n, ou(/tw de\ pareskeuasme/noi ta\s gnw/mas,
w(s i)di/a| me\n e)/xontes ta\s e(autw=n po/leis, koinh\n de\ patri/da
th\n *(ella/da oi)kou=ntes.

ti/s d' ou)k a)\n a)gaph/seie me/geqos e)/xwn a)nh\r kai\ 
duna/mew/s tinos h(gou/menos, a(\ pro\s *fi/lippon au)tw=| to\n
*makedo/na ge/graptai; e)n oi(=s a)cioi= strathgo\n a)/ndra
kai\ thlikau/ths e)cousi/as ku/rion dialla/ttein me\n ta\s
diaferome/nas po/leis a)lla\ mh\ sugkrou/ein pro\s a)llh/las,
th\n de\ *(ella/da mega/lhn e)k mikra=s poiei=n u(perido/nta
 th=s peri\ ta\ mikra\ filotimi/as toi=s toiou/tois e)pixeirei=n

e)/rgois, e)c w(=n katorqw/sas te pa/ntwn h(gemo/nwn
e)pifane/statos e)/stai kai\ a)potuxw\n th/n ge eu)/noian th\n
para\ tw=n *(ellh/nwn kth/setai: h(=s oi( tuxo/ntes pollw=|
ma=llo/n ei)si zhlwto/teroi tw=n mega/las po/leis kai\ polla\s
xw/ras katastreyame/nwn. e)/ti de\ parakeleu/etai mimei=sqai 
th\n *(hrakle/ous te proai/resin kai\ tw=n a)/llwn
h(gemo/nwn, o(/soi meta\ tw=n *(ellh/nwn e)pi\ tou\s barba/rous
e)stra/teusan, kai/ fhsi xrh=nai tou\s e(te/rwn diafe/rontas
proairei=sqai me\n ta\s me/geqos e)xou/sas pra/ceis, e)pitelei=n
de\ au)ta\s met' a)reth=s, e)nqumoume/nous o(/ti to\ 
me\n sw=ma qnhto\n e)/xomen, a)qa/natoi de\ gigno/meqa di' a)reth/n,  kai\ toi=s me\n pro\s a)/llo ti tw=n a)gaqw=n
a)plh/stws diakeime/nois a)xqo/meqa, tou\s de\ timh\n mei/zw
th=s u(parxou/shs a)pi\ ktwme/nous e)painou=men, kai\ o(/ti
tw=n me\n a)/llwn, e)f' oi(=s ei)sin a)nqrw/pinai spoudai/, 
plou/tou kai\ a)rxh=s kai\ dunastei/as, polla/kis tou\s
e)xqrou\s sumbai/nei gi/gnesqai kuri/ous, th=s de\ a)reth=s
kai\ th=s para\ toi=s plh/qesin eu)noi/as tou\s oi)kei/ous
e(ka/stou klhronomei=n. pollh\ ga\r a)na/gkh tou\s a)nagignw/skontas
tau=ta duna/stas fronh/mato/s te mei/zonos 
u(popi/mplasqai kai\ ma=llon e)piqumei=n th=s a)reth=s.

ti/s de\ a)\n ma=llon e)pi\ th\n dikaiosu/nhn kai\ th\n
eu)se/beian protre/yaito kaq' e(/kasto/n te a)/ndra i)di/a|
kai\ koinh=| ta\s po/leis o(/las tou= *peri\ th=s ei)rh/nhs lo/gou;
e)n ga\r dh\ tou/tw| pei/qei tou\s *)aqhnai/ous tw=n me\n
a)llotri/wn mh\ e)piqumei=n, e)pi\ de\ toi=s parou=si ste/rgein,
kai\ tw=n me\n mikrw=n po/lewn w(speranei\ kthma/twn
fei/desqai, tou\s de\ summa/xous  te kai\ eu)ergesi/ais
peira=sqai kate/xein, a)lla\ mh\ tai=s a)na/gkais mhde\ tai=s
